narrative.title: Western Desert Force - 1940Q3

narrative.objectives: Defense of Egypt against Italian invasion from Libya
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

supply.notes: Good supply position, defensive posture near Egyptian supply bases
